", "previous_statement_hash": "f40206a1658ecb9c1d05480f272890bf3a5f3bed17b1a69c7f5c28d8"}, "metaFilter": {"query": "", "facets": {}, "text": []}, "explanation": "", "statement_range": {"start": {"column": 0, "row": 0}, "end": {"column": 0, "row": 0}}, "startTime": "2021-11-17T00:33:41.944Z", "data": [], "filteredColumnCount": 0, "executionTime": 7136, "fetchedOnce": false, "hasResultset": false, "endTime": "2021-11-17T00:33:49.080Z"}, "errors": [], "chartMapHeat": null, "statement_raw": "-- FLIGHT DELAYS
-- http://stat-computing.org/dataexpo/2009/the-data.html

DROP TABLE flightdelays;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE flightdelays(
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT,
    day_of_week INT,
    dep_time INT,
    crs_dep_time INT,
    arr_time INT,
    crs_arr_time INT,
    unique_carrier STRING,
    flight_num INT,
    tail_num STRING,
    actual_elapsed_time INT,
    crs_elapsed_time INT,
    air_time INT,
    arr_delay INT,
    dep_delay INT,
    origin STRING,
    dest STRING,
    distance INT,
    taxi_in INT,
    taxi_out INT,
    cancelled INT,
    cancellation_code STRING,
    diverted INT,
    carrier_delay STRING,
    weather_delay STRING,
    nas_delay STRING,
    security_delay STRING,
    late_aircraft_delay STRING
)
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/flights/flightdelays/';


SELECT * FROM flightdelays LIMIT 5;


-- AIRPORTS
-- http://stat-computing.org/dataexpo/2009/supplemental-data.html


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE airports(
    iata STRING,
    airport STRING,
    city STRING,
    state STRING,
    country STRING,
    lat DECIMAL(9,6),
    long DECIMAL(9,6)
)
ROW FORMAT SERDE 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.OpenCSVSerde'
WITH SERDEPROPERTIES (
    'separatorChar'=',',
    'quoteChar'='\"',
    'skip.header.line.count'='1'
)
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/flights/airports/';


SELECT * FROM airports LIMIT 5;


SHOW TABLES;


DESCRIBE FORMATTED airports;


SELECT 
    ROUND(AVG(arr_delay), 2) AS avg_sfo_delay_min 
FROM 
    flightdelays 
WHERE 
    month=1 AND origin='SFO';


SELECT 
    a.airport,
    ROUND(AVG(f.arr_delay), 2) AS avg_delay_min 
FROM 
    flightdelays f 
    JOIN airports a ON f.origin = a.iata
WHERE 
    month = 1
GROUP BY
    a.airport
LIMIT 5;


-- CTAS


CREATE TABLE flightdelays_sfo 
AS
SELECT
    dep_time, 
    unique_carrier, 
    flight_num, 
    arr_delay, 
    origin, 
    dest,
    year,
    month,
    day
FROM 
    flightdelays
WHERE
    origin = 'SFO';


SELECT * FROM flightdelays_sfo;


DESCRIBE FORMATTED flightdelays_sfo;


-- APACHE LOGS (REGEX)


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE apachelogs (
  host STRING,
  identity STRING,
  user_id STRING,
  server_time STRING,
  request STRING,
  status STRING,
  size_bytes STRING
  )
ROW FORMAT SERDE 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.RegexSerDe'
WITH SERDEPROPERTIES (
  "input.regex" = "([^ ]*) ([^ ]*) ([^ ]*) (-|\\[[^\\]]*\\]) ([^ \"]*|\"[^\"]*\") (-|[0-9]*) (-|[0-9]*)",
  "output.format.string" = "%1$s %2$s %3$s %4$s %5$s %6$s %7$s"
)
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/apachelogs/';


SELECT * FROM apachelogs LIMIT 5;


-- BIKE SHARE

drop table stations;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE stations(
	longitude FLOAT,
	latitude FLOAT,
	name STRING,
	station_id INT,
	status STRING
)
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/bikeshare/stations/'
TBLPROPERTIES(
    'skip.header.line.count'='1'
);


SELECT * FROM stations;


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE trips(
	bikeid INT,
	checkout_time STRING,
	duration_minutes INT,
	end_station_id INT,
	end_station_name STRING,
	month INT,
	start_station_id INT,
	start_station_name STRING,
	start_time TIMESTAMP,
	subscriber_type STRING,
	trip_id BIGINT,
	year INT
)
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/bikeshare/trips/'
TBLPROPERTIES(
    'skip.header.line.count'='1'
);


SELECT COUNT(*) FROM trips;


-- consultar cuantos viajes se realizaron por año
SELECT t.year, count(*) FROM trips t GROUP BY t.year;


-- completar los valores faltantes en el campo 'year'
SELECT 
    t.*, 
    CASE 
        WHEN t.year IS NULL THEN year(t.start_time) ELSE t.year 
    END AS `year_modif`
FROM 
    trips t;


-- Links recomendados: 
-- https://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/Hive/Tutorial
-- https://gist.github.com/kzhangkzhang/258d18858889fa97194011a249b74c43

DROP TABLE trips_part;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE trips_part(
	bikeid INT,
	checkout_time STRING,
	duration_minutes INT,
	end_station_id INT,
	end_station_name STRING,
	start_station_id INT,
	start_station_name STRING,
	start_time TIMESTAMP,
	subscriber_type STRING,
	trip_id BIGINT,
	year INT
)
PARTITIONED BY(month INT)
LOCATION '/user/dario/instructor/bikeshare/trips_part/';

-- Ejecutar de 1 a 12
INSERT INTO trips_part
PARTITION(month=1)
SELECT bikeid,
	checkout_time,
	duration_minutes,
	end_station_id,
	end_station_name,
	start_station_id,
	start_station_name,
	start_time,
	subscriber_type,
	trip_id,
	year
FROM trips
WHERE month = 1;


select month, count(*) from trips group by month;

select month, count(*) from trips_part group by month;

DROP TABLE flightdelays_part;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE flightdelays_part(
    year INT,
    day INT,
    day_of_week INT,
    dep_time INT,
    crs_dep_time INT,
    arr_time INT,
    crs_arr_time INT,
    unique_carrier STRING,
    flight_num INT,
    tail_num STRING,
    actual_elapsed_time INT,
    crs_elapsed_time INT,
    air_time INT,
    arr_delay INT,
    dep_delay INT,
    dest STRING,
    distance INT,
    taxi_in INT,
    taxi_out INT,
    cancelled INT,
    cancellation_code STRING,
    diverted INT,
    carrier_delay STRING,
    weather_delay STRING,
    nas_delay STRING,
    security_delay STRING,
    late_aircraft_delay STRING
)
PARTITIONED BY(month INT, origin STRING)
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/flights/flightdelays_part/';

INSERT INTO flightdelays_part
PARTITION(month=1, origin='ABQ')
SELECT year,
    day,
    day_of_week,
    dep_time,
    crs_dep_time,
    arr_time,
    crs_arr_time,
    unique_carrier,
    flight_num,
    tail_num,
    actual_elapsed_time,
    crs_elapsed_time,
    air_time,
    arr_delay,
    dep_delay,
    dest,
    distance,
    taxi_in,
    taxi_out,
    cancelled,
    cancellation_code,
    diverted,
    carrier_delay,
    weather_delay,
    nas_delay,
    security_delay,
    late_aircraft_delay
FROM flightdelays
WHERE month = 1
AND origin = 'ABQ';
--AND origin = 'ALB';
--AND origin = 'AMA';
--AND origin = 'AUS';

select distinct month, origin from flightdelays_part;

DESCRIBE FORMATTED flightdelays_part;

SELECT * FROM flightdelays_part WHERE month = 1 LIMIT 20;

SELECT origin, count(*)
FROM flightdelays_part
GROUP BY origin;

SELECT dest, count(*)
FROM flightdelays_part
GROUP BY dest;", "lastExecutedStatements": "INSERT INTO trips_part
PARTITION(month=4)
SELECT bikeid,
	checkout_time,
	duration_minutes,
	end_station_id,
	end_station_name,
	start_station_id,
	start_station_name,
	start_time,
	subscriber_type,
	trip_id,
	year
FROM trips
WHERE month = 4;

fields.search:
-- FLIGHT DELAYS
-- http://stat-computing.org/dataexpo/2009/the-data.html

DROP TABLE flightdelays;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE flightdelays(
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT,
    day_of_week INT,
    dep_time INT,
    crs_dep_time INT,
    arr_time INT,
    crs_arr_time INT,
    unique_carrier STRING,
    flight_num INT,
    tail_num STRING,
    actual_elapsed_time INT,
    crs_elapsed_time INT,
    air_time INT,
    arr_delay INT,
    dep_delay INT,
    origin STRING,
    dest STRING,
    distance INT,
    taxi_in INT,
    taxi_out INT,
    cancelled INT,
    cancellation_code STRING,
    diverted INT,
    carrier_delay STRING,
    weather_delay STRING,
    nas_delay STRING,
    security_delay STRING,
    late_aircraft_delay STRING
)
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/flights/flightdelays/';


SELECT * FROM flightdelays LIMIT 5;


-- AIRPORTS
-- http://stat-computing.org/dataexpo/2009/supplemental-data.html


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE airports(
    iata STRING,
    airport STRING,
    city STRING,
    state STRING,
    country STRING,
    lat DECIMAL(9,6),
    long DECIMAL(9,6)
)
ROW FORMAT SERDE 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.OpenCSVSerde'
WITH SERDEPROPERTIES (
    'separatorChar'=',',
    'quoteChar'='\"',
    'skip.header.line.count'='1'
)
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/flights/airports/';


SELECT * FROM airports LIMIT 5;


SHOW TABLES;


DESCRIBE FORMATTED airports;


SELECT 
    ROUND(AVG(arr_delay), 2) AS avg_sfo_delay_min 
FROM 
    flightdelays 
WHERE 
    month=1 AND origin='SFO';


SELECT 
    a.airport,
    ROUND(AVG(f.arr_delay), 2) AS avg_delay_min 
FROM 
    flightdelays f 
    JOIN airports a ON f.origin = a.iata
WHERE 
    month = 1
GROUP BY
    a.airport
LIMIT 5;


-- CTAS


CREATE TABLE flightdelays_sfo 
AS
SELECT
    dep_time, 
    unique_carrier, 
    flight_num, 
    arr_delay, 
    origin,
